nodes.text: The Rikadian were a group whose members included a prince. According to the droid CR-8R, the Rikadian prince was thrown to a sarlacc by the librarian monks of Chazwa after he left fingerprints on a text-reader. CR-8R mentioned the librarian monks of Chazwa and the Rikadian prince while he and the cartographer Emil Graf came under attack from malfunctioning librarian droids on Nelgenam.
